title: AggregatedQuery
description: Defines the structure for a complex, aggregated query to the Federal Register API.

conditions.description: An object containing various search conditions. The structure can be nested.

facets.description: An array of strings specifying which facets to include in the response (e.g., ['agency', 'daily']).

per_page.description: The number of results to return per page.

page.description: The page number of the results to return.

order.description: The order in which to sort the results (e.g., 'newest', 'oldest').
